statements: DELETE FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE employee_id = '445e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174009' AND response_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_engagement_responses WHERE response_id = '1111' AND employee_id = '2222';
DELETE FROM inclusion_disparities WHERE disparity_type = 'Gender Pay Gap' AND employee_id = '3333';
DELETE FROM employee_survey_responses WHERE employee_id = 101 AND survey_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM survey_questions WHERE question_type = 'Employee Satisfaction';
DELETE FROM disparities WHERE disparity_type = 'Gender Disparity' AND inclusion_score < 5.0
DELETE FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 100 AND employee_id = 500
